mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.NAME, A.TITLE, A.REG_DATE, A.UP_DATE, A.CATEGORY_ID, B.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME, A.LANGUAGE_ID, C.NAME AS LANGUAGE_NAME FROM ARTICLE_MNG A, CATEGORY_MNG B, LANGUAGE_MNG C WHERE A.CATEGORY_ID = B.ID AND A.LANGUAGE_ID = C.ID ORDER BY A.UP_DATE DESC
SELECT LINK_ID, LINK_TEXT FROM SIDE_LINK WHERE ARTICLE_ID = #{id} ORDER BY INDEX_ID
SELECT ID, NAME FROM CATEGORY_MNG ORDER BY ID
SELECT ID, NAME FROM LANGUAGE_MNG ORDER BY ID
